tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE campaigns(
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name TEXT,
    target_location TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE customer_campaign_mapping(
    mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    campaign_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES campaigns(campaign_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  longitude FLOAT,
  latitude FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE campaigns (
  campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(100),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  budget DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE locations (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(100),
  city VARCHAR(50),
  country VARCHAR(50),
  longitude FLOAT,
  latitude FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE customer_campaigns (
  customer_id INT,
  campaign_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (customer_id, campaign_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES campaigns(campaign_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50),
    latitude DECIMAL(9,6),
    longitude DECIMAL(9,6)
);

CREATE TABLE campaigns (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_campaigns (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    sent_date TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE locations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    address VARCHAR(100),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    state VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE activities (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    activity_name VARCHAR(50),
    activity_date DATE,
    duration INT
);
